projects.saplatform: Saplatform is a automated service for operations, it has asset management, project release, database access function, it can control mass servers.
projects.jalpc: Jalpc is a simple, beautiful and swift theme for Jekyll. It has comprehensive function, it can be easily used and edited. It's adapted for many kinds devices.
projects.angularjs: It is a web font application written by Angularjs and deployed by Jekyll on github (gh-pages), the backend platform is Leancloud, you can use Parse as well.
projects.rsser: Rsser is an Ionic application, with this application we can read news and articles freely, you can add rss address from the given list and add it manually.

experience.ibm2016_des: Developed MPI based parallel/distributed matrix-sketching-infused machine learning routines, including novel clustering techniques.
experience.jhu_job: Research Assistant: Storage Systems and parallel computing
experience.ugrad_des: Design and analysis of a Medium Access Control protocol for Ultra-Wide Band (UWB) embedded units in MATLAB then C
